name: 蔡佩芳
objective: 使學生建立邏輯量化思考，並了解管理科學解決問題之方法及應用，且有能力利用電腦工具協助分析經營管理問題，達成最佳化決策。
schedule:
1. Introduction to Modeling in OR
2. Formulations in Linear Programming
3. Graphical Solution and Basic Solution (BV and NBV)
4. Simplex Method
5. Artificial Starting Solution
6. Duality and Dual Model
7. Shadow Price and Sensitivity Analysis
8. Transportation Model and Assignment Model
9. Network Models, Minimal Spanning Tree, Shortest Path, Maximum Flow
10. PERT/CPN
scorePolicy:
Homework Assignments: 30%
Quiz: 10%
Mid-term Exams: 40% (20% each)
Final Exam: 20%
materials: Textbook: Hillier, F.S. and Lieberman, G.J. (2009), Introduction to Operations Research, 8th Edition, McGraw-Hill Int’l, Taipei. 黃聯海導讀(required)
